error.not-running: There is no poll running, type {{prefix}}poll start <option 1> <option 2> ... [option n]
error.already-running: There is already a poll running, type {{prefix}}poll stop to stop the current poll.
error.already-voted: You already put in your vote!

open: Poll now open for voting, type {{prefix}}vote <poll #> to vote for an option.
closed: The poll is now closed for voting.
vote-changed: Changed your vote to the option {{option}}

error.no-recent: There aren't any strawpolls recently created.
error.no-title: Cannot run a strawpoll without a title, use --title "title" to set the title
error.no-options: You need to specify at least 2 options for the poll

strawpoll.created: Created strawpoll, click here to vote: {{url}}
